messages.zh: 你的成长该说是超出我的预期了呢。
messages.tl: Your growth should be beyond my expectations.
It’s not up to you to judge!

messages.zh: 我没问题哦，你们爱怎么样就怎么样。
messages.tl: I have no problem, what do you like when you love.
Withdrew to the lower city. Let them go.

messages.zh: 再拖下去事情就要变得没趣了。
messages.tl: It will be boring to drag on.

messages.zh: 我很讨厌无聊的，就这样。
messages.tl: I hate being bored, just like that.

messages.zh: 我很期待下次再会哦，阿米娅。
messages.tl: I am looking forward to seeing it again next time, Amiya.
It has already exceeded the scheduled time.
I am coming to... escort the rear officer.

messages.zh: 临光杜宾她们的小队，已经带着阿米娅和Dr.{@nickname}突破封锁。
messages.tl: NearlDobermann's team has already broken the blockade with Amiya and Dr.PLAYER.

messages.zh: 而留下来断后的干员们......
messages.tl: And the Crew that stayed after the break...

messages.zh: 你我是最后两个活着的。
messages.tl: You and I are the last two to live.
... I remembered... that... that monster Talulah... just one person...

messages.zh: 近卫们竟然眨眼间就像棋子一样迸散横飞.......
messages.tl: The guards actually squinted like a chess piece in the blink of an eye.......

messages.zh: 那个怪物像捏黄油一样捏碎了重装干员......
messages.tl: The monster crushed like a butter and reloaded the clerk...
Don't say anything. You are very hurt.

messages.zh: 荒唐......太荒唐了！她就是天灾的化身......
messages.tl: Ridiculous... too ridiculous! She is the embodiment of natural disasters...

messages.zh: 否则，火力小队怎么可能一瞬间被焚烧成灰......！
messages.tl: Otherwise, how can the fire squad be burned to ash in a flash...!

messages.zh: 我帮你应急处理了一下。
messages.tl: I will help you with an emergency.

messages.zh: ......头儿，逃吧。你的话，一定能够杀出去。
messages.tl: ... head, run away. Your words will definitely be able to kill.

messages.zh: 我们只拖了那个怪物几分钟。阿米娅她们至少需要十五分钟才能突破。
messages.tl: We only dragged the monster for a few minutes. Amiya they need at least fifteen minutes to break through.

messages.zh: Dr.{@nickname}和阿米娅安全之前，我不能走。
messages.tl: I can't go before Dr.PLAYER and Amiya are safe.
I have to stop the monster first.

messages.zh: 你的命是我废了一只手换回来的。
messages.tl: Your life is that I have lost one hand and changed it back.

messages.zh: 哪怕你只能再活一分钟，我也希望这只手至少值一分钟。
messages.tl: Even if you can only live another minute, I hope that this hand will be worth at least one minute.

messages.zh: 我去去就回。照顾好自己。
messages.tl: I will go back when I go. take care of yourself.

messages.zh: 为什么......为什么......要让我看见！
就只能这样而已吗......就只能......只能看着......而已吗......！
messages.tl: Can you just do this... you can only... just watch... but?...
Oh... I really... don’t live up to expectations.

messages.zh: 你们一定能实现......大家的愿望......
messages.tl: You can certainly achieve... everyone’s wishes...

messages.zh: ......没，没什么。只是刚才突然有些......
messages.tl: ...no, nothing. Just suddenly there was some...

messages.zh: 以前有个人这么对我说......
messages.tl: Someone used to say this to me...

messages.zh: 眼泪......要留到战争结束之后。
messages.tl: Tears... stay until after the war.
